author: Yaman Agarwal

recipeIntros.text: Hey Foodies, as the summer heat is scorching up, I am here with a simple recipe of a cooling summer drink to freshen up and beat the heat! Without any further ado, here comes our Green Cooler :D

Refreshing, isn't it?
Stay tuned, the more is yet to come, until then, Happy Cooking :)

recipeNotes: If you don't have a shaker, you could use the serving glass itself (minus the shaking part!)
title: Green Cooler Mocktail Recipe | Quick, Easy & Refreshing Indian Style Summer Drink

steps.text: Add ice to a shaker. Add the khus syrup and the kiwi crush to the shaker.
To cut down the excess sweetness from both the khus sryup and kiwi crush, add a tsp of lemon juice.
Add a bit tender coconut water, and shake up!
Next add ice to a serving glass, add the crushed ice. Pour in the green cooler.
Top it up with a mint sprig and some tender coconut water.
